mapper.select: select p.member_id as member_id, f.fin_name as fin_name from products p, finance f where p.fin_no=f.fin_no and p.fin_no=#{fin_no}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select p.fin_no , count(p.fin_no), f.fin_name from products p, finance f where p.fin_no like '${dbno}%' and p.fin_no = f.fin_no group by p.fin_no, f.fin_name order by count(p.fin_no) desc) a) where rnum between 1 and 3
select member_id, f.fin_name as fin_name from finance f, products p where p.fin_no = f.fin_no and member_id = #{member_id}
